author: wvalthar
title: chain-lib Token Viewer for everyone
description: It's common to need to show users what is in their wallet, nfts, tokens, etc. Most projects don't integrate it since its difficult to build.
solution: Build a web component to view tokens in a wallet that anyone can use no matter what javascript framework they use, with appropriate filters.
experience: Built the wallet / token viewer for Novella, which was one of the most advanced token viewers. SPO, Alanzo Purple tester, Plutus Pioneer 1
